content: These ideas extend to culture itself. I’m upset that I was programmed with a consumer culture that’s destroying our planet and creating alienation, misery and waste around the globe. It would have been much better to be programmed with a “menu” of choices that allowed people to live freely and sustainably while having meaningful roles in protecting and maintaining their local environment. Science is not working for the people right now. It’s little more than a tool of exploitation. This must change.
